description.value: At 20th level, the silver skies and conduits of the Astral Plane are permanently connected to you. You become immune to the retroactive aging side effects incurred when leaving a plane with the timeless planar trait. You do not gain negative levels when slain on the Astral Plane while using @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{Astral Projection}, and any effect that would sever your silver cord instead returns you to your physical body if you succeed at a Will save (DC = 10 + the CR of the creature or caster level of the effect that severed the cord). In addition, when applying the @Compendium[pf1.feats.wFoLrh5FeeqBXsQ8]{Quicken Spell} metamagic feat to a spell, it uses up a spell slot only 3 levels higher than the spell’s actual level. This ability does not stack with other abilities that would reduce the spell’s final adjusted level.
